app_name: Lok L0k: Watch TV drama, Movie
description:
Lok L0k — Your All-Access Pass to the World of Movies.

This ultimate movie companion is designed for film lovers who want it all — discovery, excitement, and a front-row seat to every story.

- Browse Your Way – Explore films by genre, rating, or release date, and find exactly what fits your mood.

- Never Miss a Premiere – Get instant alerts for new releases and upcoming must-see premieres.

- Your Watchlist, Your Rules – Save the titles you can’t wait to see and track the ones you’ve conquered.

- Rate & Relive – Share your take on movies and TV shows, and watch reviews from critics and fans alongside cast info and full details.

- IPTV Smart Player – Enjoy smooth, integrated playback with a built-in, smart viewing experience.

Download the app and step into a cinematic universe like never before.

Data Source Transparency

All movie and TV details — including images, ratings, and descriptions — are powered by The Movie Database (TMDB).
We use the TMDB API to bring you this rich library of content, but we are not endorsed or certified by TMDB.

Important Disclaimer

This app is an entertainment guide, not a streaming service.
We are not affiliated with, or endorsed by, any third-party content providers or film studios.
No movies or TV shows are streamed or hosted within the app.
All trademarks, copyrights, and other intellectual property remain the property of their respective owners.

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

developer: Chengdu Fengmingxuan Network Technology Co., Ltd.
description:
BookTok: Fiction Reading App for All Fiction Lovers  
BookTok is an App for fiction reading, dedicated to serving all the fiction lovers!  

We have a variety of themes, including fantasy, martial arts, romance, urban, campus and so much more. Everything that you can think of is all here!  

We update the bookstore every day, releasing new chapters in seconds—it couldn’t be more convenient for readers! We also have various events awaiting you!  

We keep trying and revising, just to be your closest reading companion.  


Key Features  
【Massive Fictions】  
Cover popular online fictions with various lists and fine classification, including male and female sections, selected books, smart recommendations and more!  

【Quality Reading Experience】  
Customize your read with simulated 3D page turning, offline download, font switching, background adjustment and night mode. We present exquisite book covers, neat content layout, and many other delicate designs to ensure a good experience.  

【Personalized Service】  
Choose from various background colors, skins and fonts. Set your personal reader with a simple click.  

【Intelligent Synchronization】  
Reading progress and notes can be intelligently synchronized and saved in your account. No need to worry about changing devices.  


About Auto-Renewable Subscriptions  
Auto-renewable subscriptions in the app include Check-in Coins Packs.  
Billing period**: The Check-in Coins Packs are available on monthly, quarterly and yearly bases.  
Price:  
- Monthly: USD 7 and 13  
- Quarterly: USD 20 and 38  
- Yearly: USD 60 and 98  
Payment: The purchase will be charged to your iTunes account.  
Renewal: When you subscribe to the Check-in Coins Pack, your subscription will renew automatically. You'll be charged at the start of each billing cycle until you cancel. Subscriptions are automatically charged each period (monthly or other), and you may be charged no more than 24 hours before the start of each cycle.  
Cancellation: You may cancel a subscription at any time more than 24 hours before your renewal date.  


 Important Links

Contact Us

تطبيق قبيلة مطير

 يجمع جميع أفراد القبيلة لتداول أخبـار ومنـاسبات القبيلـة ويحتوي التطبيق علي جميع أفراد القبيلة وتصنيفهم حيث منهم {تاريخ مطير- سياسية -  افراح - عزاء - مناسبات - مزاين مطير -شخصيات ورموز }

ويتم تصنيف الاخبار حسب نوع الأخبـار

- أخبار عامة
- أخبار أفراح
- أخبار تهنئات
- أخبار شكر
- أخبار وفاة

وأيضا المناسبات يتم تقسيها حسب التاريخ من خلال التقويم الموجود بالتطبيق يتم اختيار التاريخ وعرض كل المناسبات الموافقه له وبشكل اخر يوجد اختيار داخل التطبيق " مناسبات اليوم " يحتوي علي جميع المناسبات لليوم الحالي لسهولة الوصول اليها , كما يدعم التطبيق خاصيه الاشعارات وامكانية اضافة الاخبار والمناسبات الخاصه بالقبيلة

كما يحتوي التطبيق علي جزء خاص بالتعريف بالقبيله ويحتوي علي
1 - المقدمة : وتحتوي علي نبدة تاريخيه لتاريخ القبيلة
2 - شيخ القبيلة : وتحتوي علي مقال تعريفي عن شيخ القبيلة
3 - فروع مطير : محتواها علي شكل مقالات للتعريف بجميع ما يخص القبيلة
4 - ديار مطير : عباره عن صورة تعريفيه ومقال نصي
5 - وسوم مطير وموروث مطير : تحتوي علي اخبار بنظام المقالات

Osamh Movies – منصتك المتكاملة للترفيه المجاني بجودة استثنائية

استعد لتجربة ترفيهية لا مثيل لها مع Osamh Movies، التطبيق الذي يجمع بين أحدث الأفلام، والمسلسلات، والأنمي، وأقوى البطولات الرياضية، بما في ذلك البث المباشر للقنوات المشفّرة، وكل ذلك مجانًا وبدون تسجيل.

 ماذا يقدّم لك Osamh Movies؟

 أفلام حديثة بجودات عالية
استمتع بأحدث الإصدارات السينمائية العربية والعالمية بجودات تصل إلى 1080p, BluRay, وWEB-DL.

 مكتبة مسلسلات متجددة
تابع أقوى المسلسلات من مختلف التصنيفات: دراما، أكشن، إثارة، كوميديا والمزيد.

 أنمي مترجم بتصنيفات واضحة
لمحبي الأنمي: مكتبة ضخمة ومنسقة بعناية مع تحديثات مستمرة وترجمة احترافية.

 تغطية شاملة لعالم كرة القدم
جدول مباريات يومي محدث حسب توقيت منطقتك، مع إشعارات للمباريات المهمة والبث المباشر للقنوات الرياضية الشهيرة.

 بث مباشر بدون تقطيع
شاهد قنوات رياضية مشفّرة بجودة عالية عبر مشغل داخلي مرن وسريع.

 مميزات التطبيق:

مشغل فيديو داخلي سريع يدعم تغييرات الجودة

واجهة استخدام سهلة، أنيقة، وداعمة للغة العربية

عرض توقيت المباريات بدقة حسب موقعك الجغرافي

إشعارات ذكية لمباريات الفرق التي تتابعها

بدون اشتراكات – بدون تسجيل – فقط افتح واستمتع

description:
التطبيق الرسمي الوحيد لجريدة الجريدة الكويتية.

تطبيق جريدة الجريدة لمتابعة آخر وأهم الأخبار المحلية، والدولية، والاقتصادية، والرياضية، والمنوعة، فضلاً عن نخبة من أبرز كتاب الكويت والعالم العربي.

ابق مطلعاً أولاً بأول على آخر الأخبار، كما يوفر لك التطبيق التغطيات الجادة لأهم العناوين والقضايا على الساحتين المحلية والعالمية من خلال التقارير الموثقة ومقاطع الفيديو والتحقيقات المصورة.

كما يمكن تصفح عدد الجريدة PDF يومياً إضافة إلى معرض الفيديو الخاص الذي يتناول القضايا السياسية والاقتصادية والاجتماعية اليومية.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app

developer: Dow Jones & Company, Inc., publisher of The Wall Street Journal.
description:
Navigate global markets with Barron’s, the world’s premier investing publication. Get the trusted insights and in-depth analysis that have been guiding investors since 1921. With comprehensive financial analysis, daily commentary, and investment strategies from Wall Street’s best minds, the Barron’s app gives you access to critical news moving global markets, wherever you are. Now available direct to you on the iPhone and iPad—never miss an opportunity to catch the next rally, or avoid the next correction. 

Download the app today and get instant access to Barron’s exclusive articles, providing you with critical insights and forward-looking analysis on stocks, bonds, commodities, funds and more. Plus, receive top investment ideas, recommendations and in-depth coverage of developments shaping global economies and affecting business around the world. 

Simple to use, intuitive and beautifully designed in keeping with the print magazine’s format, the new Barron’s app allows you to easily access the information you need, when it matters most. The recently redesigned Barron’s app has countless new features, including a new download and save feature—giving you access to investment articles, daily financial news and insightful analysis whether you’re at home connected to Wi-Fi, or commuting to and from work. 

Additional key features include: 
* Insightful reporting on business, financial markets, the economy and global indexes—including U.S., Asian, European and emerging markets. 
* Access to real-time stock quotes within articles—plus, interactive charts and key metrics to help you identify the next investment opportunity for portfolio.
* Full articles from Barron’s iconic, Saturday print edition—published each weekend when the newest issue hits newsstands.
* Full access to Barron’s U.S. and Asia Editions 
* New user-friendly design—clean, sleek and optimized for iOS devices. 
* Plus, access to Barron’s previous print editions.
* Widgets to view Top Stories picked by The Barron's Editors

Barron’s offers comprehensive investment articles, economic data releases and unrivalled financial analysis that helps you put breaking news into perspective—allowing you to understand what’s being reported and the impact it has on your funds, the financial markets, business and the global economy. In addition, the new Barron’s app also gives you the tools and data you need to navigate global indexes, pick stocks and outsmart the market. With access to real-time stock quotes within articles, interactive charts and key metrics, as well as exclusive insight from Wall Street’s best minds and unrivalled financial news coverage, you’ll always have the information you need, when it matters most. 

The subscription-based, full version of the Barron’s app gives you complete access to Barron’s, the world’s premier investing and finance publication—get daily updates from Wall Street’s best, plus peerless financial reporting and business insights. With a new design, optimized for iPhone and iPad, the new Barron’s app allows you to navigate global markets with confidence. Download the Barron’s app today and see why we’ve been a trusted source for financial reporting since 1921. 

New subscribers pay only $19.99 a month for unlimited access to Barron’s on iPhone, iPad and Barron’s Online. Subscriptions include a 4-week free trial.

Your subscription will renew automatically each month and payment will be charged to your iTunes Account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

By downloading the app you agree to the Dow Jones Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Cookie Policy.

Subscriber Agreement and Terms of Use: 
https://www.dowjones.com/terms-of-use/

Privacy Policy:
https://www.dowjones.com/privacy-notice/

Cookie Policy:
https://www.dowjones.com/cookie-notice/

Published monthly, Airliner World is the largest selling commercial aviation magazine in the world and is a must-read for anyone interested in or associated with the industry, so subscribe and save today! Our extensive coverage of the world's airlines, airports and aircraft is unrivalled whilst we regularly feature articles on other aspects of the airline industry such as Air Traffic Control and Flight Safety.

For up-to-the-minute news and features on new leases, deliveries, technology, key industry personnel and airport developments from the airline scene; make Airliner World your magazine of choice.
 
Please note: Posters, calendars or wall planners, plans, decals etc. may not necessarily be included with this digital issue. Please check the specific issue’s description within the app, to see if it is included with that digital version.

Published by Key Publishing Ltd. The entire contents of this title is © copyright. All rights reserved.

----------------------------------------------

This is a FREE App download including a FREE sample issue. The current issue, back issues and future issues can be purchased within the app. 

Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the latest regular issue at the time of purchase.

-The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product.
-You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period.
-Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased.
-If a subscription offers a free trial, at the end of the trial period, you will be charged the full price of the subscription. You may cancel a subscription during its free trial period via the subscription settings on your iTunes account. This must be done 24 hours before the end of the subscription period to avoid being charged.

Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account.

We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved.
If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update, please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store

Help and frequently asked questions can be accessed in-app and on pocketmags.

If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com

--------------------

http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx

You can find our terms and conditions here:
http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

Silenza – Your Daily Moment of Stillness 
Find peace in silence.
Silenza invites you to pause for just one minute each day — no movement, no sound, no distractions.
If you stay completely still and silent, you’ll unlock a new serene illustration from the World of Calm collection.
 
Each day adds to your streak and opens a new piece of tranquil beauty — a quiet motivation to return, breathe, and simply be.
 
Key Features:
• 60-second “moment of silence” sessions
• Motion, sound, and touch detection for full mindfulness immersion
• Daily streak tracker to keep your calm routine
• Unlockable collection of peaceful illustrations
• Minimalist, atmospheric design
• Gentle animations and sounds for inner balance
 
Embrace silence. Discover stillness. Unlock peace with Silenza.

Discover original reporting and understand the events shaping the world in The New York Times app. Follow breaking news and get live updates. Watch news videos that provide context on top stories. Listen to news podcasts, culture podcasts, narrated articles and more. Access a range of coverage for the U.S., Australia and the world, including investigations, cultural commentary and analysis.


Download the app to enjoy all of The Times, all in one place: breaking news and in-depth reporting, plus games, recipes, audio journalism, product reviews, sports coverage and more.



BREAKING NEWS AND LIVE UPDATES

Peech – Turn Anything Into Audiobooks!

Meet Peech, your personal AI-powered reading sidekick that transforms all your text - PDFs, web articles, physical books, and more - into crystal-clear audiobooks. Whether you’re racing through study notes, catching up on blog posts, or diving into that spicy new novel, Peech has you covered.

The Magic of AI Voices
	• Smart Voice Matching: Peech’s advanced AI picks the perfect voice for each genre - whether it’s serious academic reading or a lighthearted romance.
	• Natural & Lifelike: Our voices are so real, you might forget you’re listening to an app.

Effortless Content Scanning
	• Lightning-Fast OCR: Snap a pic of any page or book, and Peech instantly converts it to audio. No more manual typing!
	• Web & PDF Parsing: Just paste a link or upload a file to start listening - perfect for busy pros, students, and anyone who prefers ears over eyes.

Speedy Reading, On-the-Go
	• High-Speed Playback: Devour your favorite content up to 5x faster - perfect for power-learners or those who want to binge-listen on the run.
	• Playlists & Autoplay: Build custom playlists to keep the stories rolling, so you can multitask like a boss.

One App, All Languages
	• Automatic Language Detection: Peech seamlessly identifies and narrates in 60+ languages.
	• Global Accessibility: Great for language learners, busy professionals, and anyone with reading challenges.

Why Peech?
	• Students: Turn textbooks into engaging audio lectures - study smarter, not harder.
	• Busy Professionals: Catch up on news, memos, or trade articles during your commute.
	• Accessibility: An empowering reading solution for users with visual or reading impairments.
	• Content Lovers: From classics to your favorite steamy novels - Peech reads it all.

Free Trials & Subscriptions

Experience Peech with our flexible subscription plans, some offering free trials. Dive into unlimited content and see how Peech revolutionizes your reading routine - no commitment, no hassle.

Ready to transform your reading life? Give Peech a try and unlock the power of AI-driven audio today!

FOKE – Friends of Kannur Association App

FOKE is the official mobile app for the Friends of Kannur community. Stay connected with your association, receive important updates, and enjoy exclusive benefits — all from one convenient place.

Whether you're keeping up with the latest events, accessing your digital membership ID, or exploring special member offers, FOKE helps you stay engaged and informed wherever you are.

Features:

Latest News & Updates
Get real-time association announcements and community news.

Digital Member ID
Access your membership card instantly — no need to carry a physical card.

Exclusive Offers
View available member benefits, partner discounts, and special promotions.

Instant Notifications
Receive alerts about events, programs, and association activities.

Community Engagement
Stay connected with Friends of Kannur members around the world.

About Friends of Kannur

Friends of Kannur (FOKE) is a global community committed to supporting and celebrating Kannur culture, values, and unity. Our purpose is to bring members together, support our community, and create meaningful connections.

Stay connected. Stay informed. Stay united with FOKE.
